blocky-bubbles.options.animations.toolti: Whether the bubble column textures should be animated (requires asset reload).
blocky-bubbles.options.opaque_faces.tool: Whether bubble columns should render with completely opaque faces.
blocky-bubbles.options.quality.tooltip: Controls the quality of bubble columns.
blocky-bubbles.options.cullface_method.s: Bubble column faces cull when the adjacent block is either a bubble column or a full, solid, square side of an opaque block. This resembles how Java Edition handles face culling on most other blocks.
blocky-bubbles.options.cullface_method.n: Bubble column faces cull when the adjacent block is anything other than air, including water, glass and other bubble columns. This matches the behavior of vanilla Bedrock Edition.
